Description: Book of the Dead of Anhay; frame 5; full colour vignettes; blue border at top, yellow/red at bottom. Vignette of Osiris watching the judgement of Anhay. Spell 110 with vignette of Field of Reeds.
Curator's comments: Published: Egyptian Treasures (Shanghai 1999): 212-215 No 64. Tarasenko, Mykola. 2016. Studies on the vignettes from chapter 17 of the Book of the Dead. I, The image of mś.w Bdšt in ancient Egyptian mythology (Archaeopress Egyptology 16), Oxford, p. 84. D. Antoine and M. Vandenbeusch, Egyptian mummies. Exploring ancient lives, Sydney 2016, pp. 124-5.
Bibliographic references: Quirke 1993 / Owners of funerary papyri in the British Museum (14)
Taylor 2010 / Journey through the afterlife: Ancient Egyptian Book of the Dead (no. 121)
Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (134517) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/134517)
Exhibition history: Exhibited: 2010 4th Nov-2011 6th March, Round Reading Room BM, Book of the Dead
Condition: Papyrus Survey: Condition Details: Papyrus: bleached, fragile, loss Black ink Red ink Pigment: faded, copper degradation, loss, friable Backed: brown paper Checked for loan to Hildesheim 1990 Checked for loan to Far East 1997 Refused for loan to Birmingham 2001 Displayed in Room 62 until 1997 Transferred to horizontal storage October 1999 Mount Details: Sandwich: glass Binding: Filmoplast T self adhesive linen tape Object Priority: B Mount Priority: A Overall Condition: C Curatorial condition comment: good
Acquisition name: Purchased through: Sir Ernest A T Wallis Budge
